name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Donald L. GAERTTNER, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Donald L. GAERTTNER, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The matter is remanded to Superior Court for consideration of the issues raised in Petitioner Donald L. Gaerttner’s pro se brief. Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
543 A.2d 1091
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Donald L. GAERTTNER, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 18, 1988.
